main_definition: A snack food made from sliced potatoes that have been fried or baked, also a slang term referring to small parts of something broken off.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Snack food made from deep-fried thinly sliced potatoes
meanings_and_examples.example: She enjoyed some crispy chips with her beer.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Small fragments or pieces that have been broken off from a larger whole
meanings_and_examples.example: There were several small chip marks on the edge of the glass vase after it fell to the floor.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In computing, refers to the data storage in chips found inside electronic devices such as computers and smartphones.
meanings_and_examples.example: The new processor has twice the number of chips for increased performance.
